import React ,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import {Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Card,Button, ListGroupItem} from "react-bootstrap" import Rating from '../components/Rating' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const [product,setProduct]=useState({}) useEffect(()=>{ const fetchProduct =async ()=>{ const {data} =await axios.get(`/api/products/${ma}`) setProducts(data) } fetchProduct(); },[]) return ( <> Go Back {/* fetch product name */}

{product.name}

 {/* fetch product reaviews */} {/* fetch price */} Price :{product.price} {/* fetch description */} Description : {product.description} Price : {product.price} Status : {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'in stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
